body:
Should this be called `THCSTensor_(newIndices)` (and newValues)? This is consistent with other TH* methods that incref their return values, so people know to call `free` later.

Btw why do you need to do this narrow? When does indices.size > nnz ?
body_html:
Should this be called THCSTensor_(newIndices) (and newValues)? This is consistent with other TH* methods that incref their return values, so people know to call free later.

Btw why do you need to do this narrow? When does indices.size > nnz ?
body_text:
Should this be called THCSTensor_(newIndices) (and newValues)? This is consistent with other TH* methods that incref their return values, so people know to call free later.
Btw why do you need to do this narrow? When does indices.size > nnz ?
